com.compendium.ui.toolbars
Class UIToolBarFormat

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.toolbars.UIToolBarFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIConstants, IUIToolBar, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UIToolBarFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIToolBar, java.awt.event.ActionListener, IUIConstants

This class manages the Node Formatting toolbars

Nested Class Summary
private  class UIToolBarFormat.MyComboBoxEditor
          Inner class, just to set the width of the editor for the choiceboxes as it was drawing too large on the toolbar.
